description.value: The blight projects its senses to any point in its cursed domain, gaining a precise sense of its surroundings with a 500-foot radius until the end of its next turn. A blight can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate] through this sensory link. A blight can Sustain this ability, but cannot use it to extend its senses beyond the edges of its domain.

publication.title: Pathfinder #211: The Secret of Deathstalk Tower
